title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When selecting 'Close All Saved' option in the file menu, the files are not always closed.
EB: It should close the files without saving, as no changes have been made.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open multiple files in the software.
2. Make changes to some of the files.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' option from the file menu.
4. Check if all the files are closed without saving.
